job.title: Machine Learning/Data Engineer
job.description: ltpgtThe RoleampnbspThe machine learning engineer is expected to optimize the section on our commercial application machine learning pipelines You will be evaluating existing machine learning ML processes performing statistical analysis to resolve data set problems and enhancing the accuracy of our commercial softwares predictive automation capabilitiesltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtTo ensure success as a machine learning engineer you should demonstrate solid data science knowledge and experience in a related ML role The machine learning engineer will be someone whose expertise translates into the enhanced performance of predictive automation softwareltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtMachine Learning Engineer ResponsibilitiesltpgtltulgtltligtConsult with product managers to determine and refine machine learning objectives and product requirementsltligtltligtDesign sections of the machine learning pipeline and selfrunning feature engineering to automate predictive modelsltligtltligtTransform data science teams prototypes and apply appropriate ML algorithms and tools to create nearlevel production code to be handed off to development for routinizationltligtltligtWork with the data science team to ensure that algorithms generate accurate product resultsltligtltligtSolve complex problems with multilayered data sets as well as optimizing existing machine learning libraries and frameworksltligtltligtDevelop ML algorithms to analyze huge volumes of historical data to assist the product make predictions on the data sets Data sets are customer and noncustomer dataltligtltligtRun tests performing statistical analysis and interpreting test resultsltligtltligtDocument machine learning processesltligtltligtKeep abreast of developments in machine learningltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtMachine Learning Engineer RequirementsltpgtltulgtltligtBachelors degree in computer science data science mathematics or a related fieldltligtltligtMasters degree in computational linguistics data analytics or similar will be advantageousltligtltligtAt least two years experience as a machine learning engineerltligtltligtAdvanced proficiency with Python code writingltligtltligtExtensive knowledge of ML frameworks libraries data structures data modeling and software architectureltligtltligtIndepth knowledge of mathematics statistics and algorithmsltligtltligtSuperb analytical and problemsolving abilitiesltligtltligtGreat communication and collaboration skillsltligtltligtExcellent time management and organizational abilitiesltligtltulgtltpgtltpgt
